summary: Changes the Animation for Orc females to the female ones
descriptionHtml:
Changes the Animation for Orc females from the male to the female Animation.

COMPATIBILITY:
Should be compatible with every mod that doesn't change the Orc or Orc Vampire race or the female orc NPC's.
If you want to use it with UFO better load UFO after it, because i think UFO changes the Orc female followers too.

CHANGES:
Changed the Animation file used by female Orc's from male to female.
Changed the flag "Opposite Gender Anims" to false for most Orc females
(I don't know why it was ticked, because in vanilla they would also use the male animation without it)

NOTES:
Pictures were taken with Animation Mods on:
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11447] Feminine Running and New Dash Animation [/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12883] CATWALK Fix [/url]

When requested I can also upload a version without the NPC edits.

*sorry for my bad english, it's not my native language*

Thanks to:
- Bethesda for Skyrim and the Creation Kit
- Edoin for CATWALK Fix
- xp32 for Feminine Running and New Dash Animation
author: xMaster2072
